author: kdlong
body:
#### PR description:

Modifies the scale weights regex in GenWeightsTableProducer to store the NNLOPS weights

These weights corrected the underlying NLO MC to the NNLO accuracy. Without them, the NNLOPS MC is not useful. The weights have the normal format, but with -NNLOPS after them. Just change the regex to consider this as well

#### PR validation:

Confirmed that it works for a NNLOPS samples and does not affect others. Tested, for example

/WWJTo2L2Nu_NNLOPS_TuneCP5_13TeV-powheg-pythia8/RunIIFall17MiniAODv2-PU2017_12Apr2018_94X_mc2017_realistic_v14-v1/MINIAODSIM
title: Modify scale regex in NanoAOD to catch NNLOPS weights
